data.message: I love you Mr. President, but why have you sold your soul unto the Devil? The founding Father's of America would never invite the Pope to America. Sorry but you have just turned your people over unto popery, you will be sorry, for they will return to capture  America & will rule from the White house. Have you forgotten your history? What will you do when they begun to murder your people??  Sorry they have to use you!  A black man to do their dirty work.
